titles.title: You Are So Good to Me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are beautiful, my sweet, sweet song.
You are beautiful, my sweet, sweet song.
You are beautiful, my sweet, sweet song.
And I will sing again.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are so good to me; You heal my broken heart.
You are my Father in heaven. (2X)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You ride upon the clouds; You lead me to the truth.
You are the Spirit inside me. (2X)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You are my strong melody.
You are my dancing rythym.
You are my perfect rhyme, and I will sing of You forever.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You poured out all Your blood; You died upon the cross.
You are my Jesus who loves me. (2X)

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
You are my Father in heaven.
You are the Spirit inside me.
You are my Jesus who loves me.
